mapper.select: SELECT m.cod, m.plan_date, m.product_cod, p.prodname, p.spec, u.name as 'unitName', od.delivery_date, o.dday, m.qty, c.name as 'clientName', m.note FROM mps m JOIN product p ON m.product_cod = p.cod JOIN unit u ON p.unit_cod = u.cod JOIN orders o ON m.order_cod = o.cod JOIN orderdetail od ON o.cod = od.cod and m.orderdetail_num = od.num JOIN client c ON o.client_cod = c.cod WHERE m.cod = #{cod}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mps(cod, order_cod, orderdetail_num, product_cod, plan_date, qty, employee_cod, procurement, account, plan, note, closing) VALUES (#{cod}, #{orderCod}, #{orderdetailNum}, #{productCod}, #{planDate}, #{qty}, #{employeeCod}, #{procurement}, '완제', #{plan}, #{note}, 'N')
mapper.delete: UPDATE mps SET deleteyn = 'Y' WHERE COD = #{cod};
mapper.update: UPDATE orderdetail SET mps_state = 'Y' WHERE cod = #{orderCod} AND num = #{orderdetailNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(RIGHT (cod,3) AS SIGNED)), 0) AS cod FROM mps
